title: Support properties `hibernate.type.preferred_*_jdbc_type`
body:
### Description

The [hibernate-orm 6.0 migration guide](https://github.com/hibernate/hibernate-orm/blob/6.0/migration-guide.adoc#instant-mapping-changes) states the following in regards to some backwards incompatible instant mapping changes:

> To retain backwards compatibility, configure the setting `hibernate.type.preferred_instant_jdbc_type` to `TIMESTAMP`.

This property is not exposed in quarkus, currently requiring you to configure it like this:

> quarkus.hibernate-orm.unsupported-properties."hibernate.type.preferred_instant_jdbc_type"=TIMESTAMP

I suggest adding this and other properties mentioned in the migration guide (e.g. `preferred_duration_jdbc_type`) to quarkus.
